items.summary: Debug and fix the backend isCallerAdmin method in backend/main.mo to correctly identify admin users based on their caller principal, ensuring authenticated users are granted admin access
Add detailed logging in the backend isCallerAdmin method to output the caller principal and the admin check result for debugging purposes
Verify that the useAuth hook in frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts correctly receives and displays the admin status from the backend isCallerAdmin query
Add console logging in the Admin page component (frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx) to display the authentication state, isAdmin result, and actor availability for debugging the access denied issue
